title: The Scratch (band)
text:
The Scratch are an Irish band based in Dublin, whose music blends Irish traditional music and heavy metal.


== Career ==
The Scratch were founded in Perrystown in 2016 by four of the five members of Red Enemy, a heavy metal group.
They released their first album Couldn't Give a Rats in 2020, and their second Mind Yourself in 2023. It was nominated for the Choice Music Prize.


== Personnel ==
Conor "Dock" Dockery (guitar, backing vocals)
Cathal McKenna (bass, backing vocals)
Daniel "Lango" Lang (caj√≥n, percussion, lead vocals)
Jordan "Jordo" O'Leary (guitar, lead vocals)


== Discography ==
EPs

The Whole Buzz (2019)
